21#include "mpc-impl.h"
22
23/* return 0 iff both the real and imaginary parts are exact */
24int
25mpc_add (mpc_ptr a, mpc_srcptr b, mpc_srcptr c, mpc_rnd_t rnd)
26{
27 int inex_re, inex_im;
28
29 inex_re = mpfr_add (mpc_realref(a), mpc_realref(b), mpc_realref(c), MPC_RND_RE(rnd));
30 inex_im = mpfr_add (mpc_imagref(a), mpc_imagref(b), mpc_imagref(c), MPC_RND_IM(rnd));
31
32 return MPC_INEX(inex_re, inex_im);
33}
34
